resources:
Friendly Emotions Settings Recognition of emotions based on photos and icons - configuration
The applications are developed under a non-profit and open-source project held by Gdansk University of Technology (website) and Institute for Child Development in Gdansk (website). \nThe apps are developed and distributed free of charge. \nMore information on the website: https://tiapps.org/en/home/
For proper use you need a pair of applications: Friendly Emotions and Friendly Emotions Settings!
Name got updated - check if change is suitable in the SAVE tab Check if name should not get updated Such step name already exists, change it

Test Active materials I would like to use the same photos that are in the MATERIAL tab Select the material to be used in test mode." Select Number of tries for each emotion Time for response In the test mode, the child works on materials marked in the MATERIAL tab.
The test mode does not use hints and reinforcements, the therapist should refrain from intervening in the interaction of the child until the end of the test. Total number of tries in the test:

Name of the level should be shorter - max 55 characters Name of the level should contain at least one character
Photos in the MATERIAL tab should represent people of both genders Photos in the TEST tab should represent people of both genders LEARN MODE: Unless you select at least one female photograph for this number of different emotions, smaller number of photographs will be displayed on the screen.
